snippet: A Republican measure to damage unions that is expected to be approved by the State Legislature would reduce wages and benefits in a hub of the labor movement.
abstract: Editorial urges Michigan Gov Rick Snyder to withhold his signature to legislation offered by state's Republican-controlled Legislature that will allow workers to avoid paying dues to union that represents their shop; warns such so-called right to work legislation would gut labor movement nationwide and transform Michigan's economy for the worse.
lead_paragraph: A Republican measure to damage unions that is expected to be approved by the State Legislature would reduce wages and benefits in a hub of the labor movement.

headline.seo: Taking Aim at Michigan’s Middle Class
headline.main: Taking Aim at Michigan’s Middle Class
headline.print_headline: Taking Aim at Michigan’s Middle Class
